description: Half a school year will attend at a time, while secondary schools will remain shut.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey primary pupils to attend two days a week
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey primary pupils to attend two days a week - BBC News
maintext: Director of public health Dr Nicola Brink said: "Given the gains we have made and the current positive position as we move through the phases of our exit strategy, now is the right time for schools to have the opportunity to start re-introducing more students as long as numbers are restricted, social distancing maintained and enhanced hygiene in place.
